name: setup-factory
description: Centralized automation platform for bug reproduction

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:worker
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../worker && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd api && npx prisma migrate dev

author: Your Team
